version_description:
• Worldwide Release!

Thanks for your support everyone, look out for more updates coming soon!
Are you enjoying the game? Leave us a review with your comments.

Version 7.19
• Gameplay Improvements
• Bug Fixes

Thanks for your support everyone, look out for more updates coming soon!
Are you enjoying the game? Leave us a review with your comments.

• Team data update with all the winter transfers and more!
• Dream League Live - play across the world with new online events!
• Training centre improvements - Now choose your unlocked formations
• Gameplay Improvements for our best experience yet
• Change the way you play! Button scaling options for big and small hands
• New and improved shop with all your favourites, and even more value packs!
• Upgraded player faces for added realism!
• Graphical improvements & updates
• Bug Fixes

Thanks for your support everyone, look out for more updates coming soon!
• Bug Fixes

• New Online Event Type - Knockout Cups are here!
• Team Boost mechanic - Improve your team's performance instantly during the match.
• Special Selection Players - Sign an enhanced player with boosted stats!
• New language support - Arabic is here for our passionate fans.
• More music - BETSIE GØLD added to our top-class soundtrack.
• Game Replays - Save your finest Dream League Live moments on the fly!
• Gameplay improvements - an even smoother experience than before.
• Bug Fixes - we've squished lots of them!

Are you enjoying the game? Leave us a review with your comments.

• Bug Fixes

Thanks everyone for your support, please keep the reviews coming!

Version 8.00
• Updated team and player data to reflect the 20/21 season!
• New player animations and AI - it's our most fluid gameplay ever!
• Upgraded visuals - for the best looking DLS match experience to date!
• Facilities additions - the Commercial Centre gets new benefits to obtain
• New Season Pass - Get rewarded for playing and go Premium for massive bonuses!
• New Physios - Keep your squad's energy full and injuries healed
• Authentic player photos - taking Dream League Soccer's realism to the next level!
• Gameplay improvements - including extra set-piece options in Dream League Live
• Updated soundtrack - a host of hand-picked songs to keep you pushing for victory!
• Bug fixes - to provide you with an enjoyable football experience

• A fresh new look - Updated menus and interface
• Updated Team Data - All licensed players for the 21/22 season
• New Challenges  - Complete daily goals for prizes!
• Fantasy Based Events - Play with established squads in special tournaments
• New facility - Upgrade your recruitment centre for Scout and Agent discounts
• Improved gameplay AI - Teams now dynamically change positioning and runs in all formations
• New kits - Even more templates to help you stand out
• More commentary - Specific lines for more match situations
• Snow added - Feel the cold on the pitch!
• New soundtrack - A curated playlist to bring excitement to your club!
• Enhanced stadium atmosphere - We've added more officials, staff, fans, banners and flags to recreate the real experience
